item.title: Urgent Street Sweeping - Sutherland Road N9, All Bins Trashed all along the road, 17th October
item.description:
Tonight someone was seen trashing all the refuse collections all along the road on both sides of Sutherland Road. Edmonton N9 There is waste all along both sides of the road please can we urgently get Street Cleaning team out to sweep the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, London

item.title: Graffiti / Tag on cycle hangar, Irving Grove SW9, 17th October
item.description:

item.title: Bad Road Surface., 16th October
item.description:
Hello, I’m a Bis Driver and Kirkdale Rd has developed ridges in the road in both direction and it’s so bad I have to drive in the middle of the road. Otherwise my bus feels like it’s going fall apart. Anyway, please can this be looked at?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kirkdale, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: “Keep Clear”, 16th October
item.description:
Hello, I’m a Bus Driver and the ‘KEEP CLEAR’ Road Markings on the Roundabout have faded and thus it’s become difficult to merge onto the roundabout from Kirkdake Road. Therefore, please can it be repainted?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 303, Kirkdale, Forest Hill, Sydenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Puffer Crossing Green Light out., 16th October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, The Village, Charlton, London
